---
title: "Installation"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```
Set the global options to find your julia binary installation (optional).
```{r setup, eval = FALSE}
options("JULIA_HOME" = "/home/bkopper/julia-1.8.2/bin")
```
Install and load JuliaCall and set it up (necessary):
```{r setup2, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("JuliaCall")
library(JuliaCall)
julia_setup()
```
Install the julia module `Diversification.jl` (necessary):
```{r install, eval = FALSE}
julia_install_package("https://github.com/kopperud/Diversification.jl")
```
The above chunk can be run again in case there are any updates.
